title: Don't let that stop you though

panels.alt: A cowboy riding left to right, smoking. The sun is up and there are birds in the sky
panels.text:
It's easier to imagine 
 the end of the world
panels.hovertext: Ursula K LeGuin wishes she said this

panels.alt: A cowboy riding right to left, smoking. The moon is up and there are stars in the sky
panels.text:
than it is to imagine 
 a cowboy with a cool hat
panels.hovertext: Ursula K LeGuin wishes she said this
